creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the code section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions. Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.
- Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.

****** FAQ ******
Q. I tried fishing, but didn't get any items.
A. Once you've acquired all the items (Shards, Assembly Parts), you can no longer get any items.

Q. I used an Archive Shard, but the blank spaces still remain.
A. When you use an Archive Shard, only 1 blank space will be removed.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)
descriptionShort: Come relax with our adorable little kitties!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Cat added
- Furniture added x2
- Whisker reward added
- Minor bugs fixed
- Added languages (Spanish, French)

*You can find newly added furniture/cats in a secret location!
Look in the game guide for the location and hints about it.

title: Secret Cat Forest

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the code section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.


****** FAQ ******
Q. I tried fishing, but didn't get any items.
A. Once you've acquired all the items (Shards, Assembly Parts), you can no longer get any items.

Q. I used an Archive Shard, but the blank spaces still remain.
A. When you use an Archive Shard, only 1 blank space will be removed.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I tried fishing, but didn't get any items.
A. Once you've acquired all the items (Shards, Assembly Parts), you can no longer get any items.

Q. I used an Archive Shard, but the blank spaces still remain.
A. When you use an Archive Shard, only 1 blank space will be removed.

A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.

At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → CLEAR CACHE (or delete temporary files)

Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft/place "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)
descriptionShort: Come relax with our adorable little kitties!

title: Secret Cat Forest

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

title: Secret Cat Forest

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

title: Secret Cat Forest

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!

find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******

Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!

****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!

- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!

■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.

Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)
descriptionShort: Come relax with our adorable little kitties!

title: Secret Cat Forest

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.

* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

****** Other experimental features ******

cricket

■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.

- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)

- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.

3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

title: Secret Cat Forest

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. If you change the device time manually, game data may be permanently deleted.




****** Other experimental features ******
At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)
Enter the same to turn off.
Try it and see what happens!



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. Manually changing the time on your device can cause various bugs.

At the top right, go to settings and type in

cricket

in the "Enter Code" section. (Only works at night!)

descriptionHtml:

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻

- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.

title:
Secret Cat Forest
1.9.87

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)


■ How to play
1. Craft "Furniture" cats love
2. Use the fishing rod to fill up the "Fish"
3. "Turn off screen" rest up and coming back later
4. Cat Appeared!!

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. Manually changing the time on your device can cause various bugs.



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

- Tap the tree on the right, collect wood and build furniture!
- Go fishing to fill up your fish inventory.
Every time cats visit, they'll gobble up your fish.
- You'll acquire items through fishing or kitty's gifts.
Upgrade using these items!
- Swipe from the right corner of the screen
(like flipping pages in a book) to go to "Archive".
- Complete your Archives to acquire a Special Album.
- Use Furniture Collection when you're out of woods!

※ Craft secret furniture (Gold?) to discover a new place!😻


■ Cloud Save
- Saved to cloud, not a server. Save/link your data to Google Play Games to keep your progress safe.


■ Permissions
- File access, camera: Will be used to save the Special Album images to your device album.


****** FAQ ******
Q. The ads will show but I never get the rewards.
A. Go to settings and type in "safemode0" in the "Enter Code" section.

Q. Ads won't appear for a long time.(Ads not ready)
A. Check the 'CS - FAQ' in settings at top right.

Q. I've completed the Profile Archive, but I'm still getting Shards!
A. There are extra Shards in the game (Around 20.) If you get more than 20,
find out which secret furniture (Gold?!) is waiting for you, and use shards to craft it!


****** Errors ******
- Once you link your data to Google Play Games, the game might not start if you haven't accepted all required permissions.
Please restart your device, restart the game and then accept all terms of service.
Permissions will only be used to save/load the game.

- Game has unexpectedly crashed(or stopped) : Clear Cache
Settings → Apps → Secret Cat Forest → Storage → Clear cache (or delete temporary files)
* DO NOT TAP ON DELETE DATA (CLEAR DATA)!

- ★IMPORTANT★ Make sure the device time is [Set Automatically]. Manually changing the time on your device can cause various bugs.



※ This game was created with the support of the Seoul Business Agency (SBA)

title:

creator: IDEASAM
descriptionHtml:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

Relax, kick back and enjoy the game!

Then, once you become friends with the cats, you can witness their special behaviors :)
Befriend as many cats as possible, and complete your own album!
You can download the album images to use as your PC or Mobile wallpaper!


■ Features
- Easy to play, intuitive controls!
- Day/Night cycle (real-time)
- Dozens of adorable kitties
- The cutest animations
- Gorgeous moving backgrounds
- Linked to Google Play game service (Cloud)
